name: Clean Sweep (Pitanova)
description:
A game created during the first IndieTales Game Jam.

Use various tools to clear out each elevator level.

Made with Anuke

CONTROLS:

WASD or Arrow Keys - Move the character

LMB - Use Tool

E (with mouse hover) - Pickup Tool

R - Reset the Level

Tools used:

  • Aseprite (art)
  • Godot Engine (engine)
  • VS Code (code)
  • sfxia (sound generator)
